attributes.action: Bring a WWE PPV to England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WWE is a vast business in the sports entertainment category, and we in the UK have been neglected by not having somthing meanigful take place since the 1990's. It is time our government request WWE bring a ppv over here, they could easily fill out Wembley Stadium and expand their business in Europe and the English government shall gain income from the huge boost a city gets when a WWE PPV takes over.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
